excerpt: "As part of the White House's ongoing efforts to regulate AI, Biden convened a meeting with executives from the seven companies at the White House on July 21. Notable attendees included pioneers such as OpenAI, Microsoft, Meta Platforms Inc., Amazon.com Inc., Inflection AI Inc. and Anthropic."
